'Eva Ngigi–Sarwari (née Eva Ngigi), is a Kenyan businesswoman
She is an executive at Visa Inc., responsible for Kenya, Somalia & South Sudan, after joining in September 2020.

A mụrụ Eva na Kenya ihe dịka 1981.
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Moi n'afọ 2004, jiri nzere bachelọ nke Business Management, na-emepe ahịa ahịa
Ọ nwetara Master of Business Administration
Mahadum Nairobi nyere ya onyinye n’afọ 2010
N’afọ 2019, ọ malitere mmemme Oxford Fintech nke ọma na Saïd Business School
Mgbe otu afọ ahụ gasịrị, ọ debanyere aha na Emeritus Institute of Management (EMERITUS), gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2020 na Diploma Postgraduate na Azụmahịa Dijitalụ.
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ mbụ, Eva banyere ụlọ akụ

Ọ nọrọ afọ ise na Cooperative Bank of Kenya, na-elekwasị anya n'ịkwalite mmekọrịta ndị ahịa ụlọ akụ na ahụmahụ. 
Ọ nọrọ afọ abụọ na CfC Stanbic Holdings, na-elekwasị anya na ngwaahịa azụmahịa na ire ahịa, dị ka onye njikwa maka ngalaba ahụ.
N'afọ 2012, Standard Chartered Kenya goro Ngigi wee ruo ihe karịrị afọ asaa ruo n'ọkwa onye isi nke ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa na ngalaba ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa
Na Jenụwarị 2020, ọ weere Project Lead of SC Ventures, ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ nke Stanchart
Ọ hapụrụ Stanchart Kenya na Septemba 2020
Na Septemba 2020, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ ọkwa ya ugbu a na Visa Inc
Ọ na-ahụ maka ọrụ na Kenya, Somalia na South Sudan.
